name: Honker Too Strong
description:
STORY:

It's good ol' Halloween, but you aren't trick or treating or scaring random kids on the street. You are a facility caretaker, and you have to care for the facility (lol). But there's one problem. A mysterious killer clown with superpowers named "Honker" has been killing people across the state, and guess what? You're his next victim!

WHAT THE HELL AM I PLAYING?

Honker Too Strong is a horror rage game that will for sure make you smash your keyboard. Explore an endless amount of randomly generated mazes with randomly placed exits. You must get to the exit before Honker's meter runs out and he finds and kills you. All the while having limited vision and useful strategies make your game intentionally lag.

CREDITS:

Maze Generator Script: OliBomby on Scratch

Ambience: MrDrNose

Emoji/Twemoji: Twitter (I shit you not)

Extra Support: My family.

Note: Honker Too Strong, nor it's developer(s), are responsible for any destruction to property caused by rage.
